rooms.name: Candle Room
rooms.description: You entered a small room lit only by a small candle hanging from the ceiling. You can see a single door to your right with a small chair in the dark corner of the room.

items.name: ring
items.description: You pick up the golden ring and pocket it.

items.name: small red pebble
items.description: You pick up the small red pebble and pocket it.

rooms.name: Three-door Room
rooms.description: You fell down a deep hole and are now stuck in a room with nothing but the hole in the room which you fell in from and three dungeon doors. You have no choice but to go through one of the doors and try to find your way out.

rooms.name: Dead-end Warning Room
rooms.description: You enter a room that looks like it was an office of some sort. The walls are covered with drawings and the table near the door has many burned papers on it. There's some random items lying around the room.

items.name: burned note
items.description: You pick up a half-burned note with the following message: 'Traveler: Ahead is a one-way path with a dead end. Procced wit-.'

items.name: small green pebble
items.description: You pick up the small green pebble and pocket it.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.description: You sweep the breadcrumbs into your pocket. Why? I have no idea.

items.name: dusty pen
items.description: Why would you pick this up? Reluctantly puts it away.

rooms.name: Wet Room
rooms.description: You slowly enter and hear the sound of a slow dripping water. A light is coming through the door on the right and you see something shiny in the puddle of water on the floor.

items.name: grimy key
items.description: You slowly reach your hand in puddle to grab the key. You wipe the key dry before putting it into your pocket.

items.name: small blue pebble
items.description: You pick up the small blue pebble and pocket it.

rooms.name: Empty Room
rooms.description: You walk up a stairway and enter a room with nothing in it.

rooms.name: Dim Room
rooms.description: You enter a barely lit room and can't see anything expect for a note on the door at the end of the room.

items.name: warning note
items.description: You grab the note off the door and see the following message: 'Are you sure you want to continue forward?'

rooms.name: Guardroom
rooms.description: You open the door and see an asleep guard sitting in a chair in the corner of the room. You quietly enter.

items.name: small orange pebble
items.description: You pick up the small orange pebble and pocket it.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: After walking up a stairway, you enter a room that looks like it used to be a kitchen. There's some stuff scattered around and you take a look around. Strangely, there's a dark gaping hole in the ceiling.

items.name: breadcrumbs
items.description: You sweep the breadcrumbs into your pocket. Why? I have no idea.

items.name: small yellow pebble
items.description: You pick up the small yellow pebble and pocket it.

items.name: rotton eggs
items.description: No, why, stop. You pocket it anyways.

rooms.name: Dark Room
rooms.description: You enter and can't actually see anything but the light coming out from under the door at the other side of the room.

items.name: adventurer's note
items.description: You pick up a note from floor and can only make out three words: '... be... careful... end.'

rooms.name: Holding Cell
rooms.description: After quietly walking past the guard and up the stairs, you see a small cot behind the iron bars with a shiny object on the pillow. There's also something strange about the right wall in the cell.

items.name: ring
items.description: You pick up the golden ring and pocket it.

items.name: small purple pebble
items.description: You pick up the small purple pebble and pocket it.

rooms.name: End Room
rooms.description: You have reached the exit of the dungeon and can see the outside from the door in the front. However, the door locks behind you locks and you cannot go back. You better hope you've collected the necessary items to exit the door in the front.

directions.roomName: You have escaped the dungeon. Congratulations!

rooms.name: Trap Room
rooms.description: You enter the room and see that theres a ring hanging on the wall. However, the door behind you looks and you can't get out. You better hope you have a key to unlock the door.

items.name: ring
items.description: You pick up the golden ring and pocket it.
